infos.value: This time, I will talk about that Sub Job in detail.
If we consider your Main Job to be that of a warrior...
...I suppose this new job you have acquired with your Limit Break could be considered a Sub Job.
You can now acquire a new ability. Let us learn it posthaste.
You were able to learn the ability without issue. Next, let us equip it so that we may use it in battle.
Each unit has two types of Sub Jobs, and the second type of Sub Job can be acquired by Limit Breaking three times.
Please note that the newly acquired Sub Job must be set in order to utilize its abilities.
I have prepared the necessary ores, so go ahead and use them.
• Enhancing Sub Jobs •

• Enhancing Sub Jobs •
Gather enough of the necessary ores and you can enhance your unit's Sub Job.
• Enhancing Sub Jobs II •
As the Sub Job's <color=#00ffff>level increases</color>, <color=#00ffff>bonuses</color> will be applied to the unit's <color=#00ffff>stats</color>...
• Enhancing Sub Jobs III •
...and sometimes <color=#00ffff>new abilities</color> can even be <color=#00ffff>unlocked</color>.
• Acquiring Abilities •

• Acquiring Abilities •
Acquiring Sub Job abilities also requires JP.
• Setting Abilities •

• Sub Abilities •
Sub Job Abilities can be set by selecting from among your acquired Jobs.
• Setting Abilities II •
You can freely arrange and pair the <color=#00ffff>Support Abilities</color> and <color=#00ffff>Reaction Abilities</color> that you will acquire from here on out.
• Sub Jobs •
Proceed to a tutorial on Sub Jobs?
Yes
No
